name: Enhanced Addon for Contact Form 7
author: aniketji007

sections.description:
Enhance your Contact Form 7 forms with customizable styling and a real-time preview. This plugin provides a user-friendly interface for easily modifying the appearance of your forms without requiring extensive coding knowledge.

Key Features

Live Preview: See how your changes will look in real-time as you edit your form.
Customizable Styling: Control various aspects of your form’s appearance, such as colors, fonts, and layout.
Easy to Use: The intuitive interface makes it simple for users of all levels to customize their forms.

Usage

Edit a form: Navigate to the Contact Form 7 editor page for the form you want to customize.
Access the “Addon Ul” tab: Click on the “Addon Ul” tab to access the plugin’s settings.
Customize the styling: Use the available options to modify the colors, fonts, and layout of your form.
Preview your changes: The live preview will update in real-time as you make changes.
Save your changes: Once you’re satisfied with the appearance of your form, save your changes.

Compatibility

This plugin is compatible with WordPress 5.0 and above and requires the Contact Form 7 plugin to be installed.

Assets

The plugin includes a src folder within the admin-panel directory. This folder contains the plugin’s source code for JavaScript and CSS assets.

assets/build: This directory houses the production-ready versions of the plugin’s assets, which are optimized for performance and efficiency.
admin-panel/src: This directory contains the development versions of the assets, which are useful for debugging and testing purposes.
These assets are essential for the plugin’s functionality, providing the necessary scripts and styles for the editor interface and interactions.

Source Code

The source code for this plugin assets/dist files can be located within the admin-panel/src directory.

Or, visit our GitHub repository for more details:
https://github.com/aniketji07/enhanced-addon-for-contact-form-7

Support

For any questions or support, please reach out to us at aniketji.wordpress@gmail.com.

License

This plugin is licensed under the GPLv2 or later.
sections.installation:
Option 1: Using the WordPress Plugin Directory

  1. Search for the plugin: Go to the WordPress admin dashboard and navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  2. Search for “Enhanced Addon for Contact Form 7” in the search bar.
  3. Install the plugin: Click the Install Now button for the plugin.
  4. Activate the plugin: Once the installation is complete, click the Activate button.

Option 2: Manual Upload

  1. Download the plugin: Download the latest version of the plugin from [link to your plugin download page, if applicable]. The plugin file will be a ZIP archive.
  2. Upload the plugin: In your WordPress admin dashboard, navigate to Plugins > Add New.
  3. Click the Upload Plugin button at the top of the page.
  4. Click Choose File and select the downloaded ZIP Â 
    archive containing the plugin files.
  5. Click Install Now.
  6. Once the installation is complete, click the Activate Plugin button.

Important Note:

This plugin requires the Contact Form 7 plugin to be installed and active on your WordPress site.

Additional Notes:

  • It’s recommended to use the WordPress Plugin Directory for installation as it’s the most secure and convenient method.
  • Uploading the plugin manually might be useful for testing custom versions or for situations where the plugin isn’t available in the directory yet.

Remember: After activating the plugin, follow the Usage section to access the settings and customize your Contact Form 7 forms.
sections.faq:
Do I need to have Contact Form 7 installed to use this plugin?

Yes, Enhanced Addon for Contact Form 7 requires the Contact Form 7 plugin to be installed and active on your WordPress site.

Can I use different styles for multiple forms?

Absolutely! The plugin allows you to control the styling for each form independently.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2 | 13 September 2024

  • Enhanced Security: Resolved security vulnerabilities.
  • Fixed: Issue with Google font loading on the editor preview panel.
  • Improved: Stopped sending update requests when there is no setting for update.

1.0.1 | 13 September 2024

  • Security Fix: Fixed a security issue to keep your site safe.
  • Security Enhancement: Added extra security measures to prevent problems.
  • Improved: Improved class names to avoid conflicts with other plugins.
  • Fixed: Form styling issue in the preview mode.

1.0.0 | 25 August 2024

Initial release.

short_description: Easily customize the appearance of your Contact Form 7 forms with a user-friendly interface and live preview.
